elements.label: Abandoned cart
elements.description: Customer added product to cart but not completed the order/transaction. Payload must not exceed 64kB.

abandonedCartUrl.description: The URL to recover the abandoned cart

storeCode.description: Store or affiliation from which this transaction occurred

total.description: Total is calculated adding revenue, shipping and tax amount and eliminating discounts amount

revenue.description: Revenue is calculated by multiplying the price at which products or services are sold by the number of units or amount sold

exchangeRate.description: Rate of exchange currency between default currency to local currency of the event

discount.description: The discount amount of order line

subtotal.description: The total amount of order line

classifications.description: The list of classifications of the product

linkUrl.description: The online catalogue of the product

imageUrl.description: The image of online catalogue of the product

coupon.description: Coupon code associated with a product

tax.description: The tax associated with the order line

itemQuantity.description: The items quantity of the product

extended.description: Empty JSON Schema used when extended properties are not defined

extraProperties.description: Extra pieces of information you can tie to events you track
